content.p: Achieving the balance between your academic and sporting ambitions is at the heart of our approach to supporting you at the University of Nottingham. Our practitioners work 1-2-1 with student-athletes, taking a confidential and holistic approach. Their objective is to work closely with both athletes and coaches in order to minimise concerns in regards to issues that may compromise their performance in Sport or study. Practitioners have a professional duty of care to athletes to support their welfare and wellbeing throughout their performance journey. The range of areas covered include: Coordinated by University of Nottingham Sportâ€™s scholarship team, we also offer tailored support to our current and future performance athletes in a number of areas; David Ross Sports Village University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD telephone: +44 (0)115 74 87000 email: sport@nottingham.ac.uk
